name: Slash Three!
description: Slash Three! Shippers, take your marks! Do you feel that the dolphin belongs with a gentle orca, or with the hot-blooded shark? Keep your freelings and emoceans close to your heart with these mix-and-match necklaces you can share with your best teammates! The drop-down menu below will give you these 5 choices: "It's meaningless without you!" A dolphin and orca pair ($16.99) "I'll show you a sight you've never seen before!" A dolphin and shark pair ($16.99) "I swim best free for the team" Dolphin single necklace ($9.99) "I want to achieve my dream" Shark single necklace ($9.99) "I won't be afraid anymore" Orca single necklace ($9.99) For those who are curious, the Orca and Shark can be paired like this. Please use the drop-down menu at the bottom of the page to select the necklace pair or single necklace of your choice! Pendant dimensions: 0.96 inches (W) x 1.61 inches (H) Chain length: 28 inches Item: 700 Pesos for a pair, 400 Pesos for a single necklace Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the indicated fee will only apply once per transaction.

options.name: Shark & Dolphin: "I'll show you a sight you've never seen before"

name: Sakura's Path
description: Sakura's Path Sakura's Path in the Secret Garden Collection celebrates springtime with intricate blossoming branches with tiny birds flitting about them. The necklaces are made of color-plated metal, with pearl white bead insets. There are three variations of the branch designs, which are available in two colors: (1) Gold and (2) Silver Cherry Blossom Foxglove Magnolia Sakura is wearing the Foxglove necklace in Gold Please use the drop-down menu below to select the color and design varation of your choice. Item: 600 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the indicated fee will only apply once per transaction.

name: Catrina's Path
description: Catrina's Path Catrina's Path in the Secret Garden Collection showcases Catrina's favorite flowers immortalized in these intricate floral pendants. Two ladybugs and a butterfly play among the blossoms. The necklaces are made of color-plated metal, with rhinestone and bead insets. The chain offers allowance for length adjustment. Catrina's Path necklaces are available in two colors: (1) Gold and (2) Silver Gold Silver Catrina's Path necklace in gold Please use the drop-down menu to select the color and design varation of your choice! Item: 1200 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the indicated fee will only apply once per transaction.

name: Adventurer's Lucky Bag!
description: Adventurer's Lucky Bag! By the power of Glob, we grant you this bag of charms for your adventures! You can keep them all for yourself, or share them with your best buds! You will get 3 necklaces for a discounted price: (2) RANDOM necklaces from our Adventurers Collection (1) RANDOM item, which could be anything in our store! These will be packaged in our signature tuxedo boxes, plus a cute starry mesh pouch! Stocks are limited, so get them while you can! Here are the designs you could get from the Adventurers Collection: Mathematical! Anyong Haseyo Lumpy Space Pendant Fuzzy Friend And you can check our home page at Tuxessories.net to see everything else! Item: 900 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the indicated fee will only apply once per transaction.

name: My Little Pendant
description: My Little Pendant Celebrate the magic of friendship! The jewel designs are printed on crystal clear acrylic with a scratch-resistant frosted finish. If you'd like to get all six necklaces, you may avail of our Harmonizing Elements Set to get the whole collection at a discounted price! Click on the thumbnails to view! Choose one of the elements that create harmony! Honesty Kindness Laughter Generosity Loyalty Magic Pendant dimensions: All designs are within 2.1 in (W) x 1.5 in (H) Chain length: 27 inches Item: 350 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. The text reads "Anyong haseyo", a greeting in Korean. Chain length: 18 inches Item: 420 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. name: Wait For It...
description: Wait For It... "Share these necklaces with your number one bro! Show the party that together, you'll make the night LEGEN- wait for it, and I hope you're not lactose intolerant because the next word is -DARY! LEGENDARY!" These frosty pendants are made with the essence of awesome that happened to be so cool it froze over and refuses to melt. They hang from metal ball chains. This listing is for a set of TWO necklaces. Pendant dimensions: LEGEN - 3.47 in (W) x 0.75 in (H) DARY - 2.55 in (W) x 0.75 in (H) Chain length: 30 inches Item: 500 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.

name: Hat-Man
description: Hat-Man "When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth." So you can always have a consulting detective around when Scotland Yard can't solve your problems. Compliance not guaranteed. We are not responsible in the event said detective requests you stop being boring. This is a two-piece pendant featuring the silhouette of a renowned "hat-man" in chocolate brown acrylic, fixed on a cream-colored frame with engraved and hand-painted detailing. Pendant dimensions: 1.44 inches (W) x 1.65 inches (H) Chain length: 28 inches Item: 500 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.

name: Deerly Beloved: Stag
description: Deerly Beloved: Stag "Remind yourself of your happiest memories, and keep them close to your heart. It will protect you as long as you remember." The pendant is cut from a special clear acrylic with the sleek silhouette accented by subtle engraved details. It is as if this design has been crafted from air. It can be yours for nine and three-quarters. Pendant dimensions: 1.84 inches (W) x 3 inches (H) Chain length: 20 inches (This is shorter than it appears as modeled. It rests around the collarbone for better stability.) Item: 400 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.

name: The Blue Box
description: The Blue Box "All of time and space; everywhere and anywhere; every star that ever was. Where do you want to start?" The design is cut from a brilliant royal blue acrylic material, and hangs from a silver-toned ball chain. The details are engraved, then hand-painted. Think nothing of this pendant's demure size. Just remember that it is always bigger on the inside. Pendant dimensions: 1.29 inches (W) x 2 inches (H) Chain length: 30 inches Item: 420 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.

name: Power Punch
description: Power Punch "Bring out your fists of mighty justice and get ready to knock some socks off!" This ring is punched up with a stylish comic-art inspired design. It starts with a bright red acrylic speech balloon that is accented with a half tone. This is topped off with a bold primary yellow typography that spells out the inner fury bursting from your first. This ring of power comes encased in a special crystal holder. WARNING: Not to be used in actual combat. People may get hurt when used in active battle. As you ought to with all pointy objects, please be wary of the sharper edges when wearing this ring. That aside, it makes a great photo prop! The whole design is affixed on a silver-toned adjustable ring base. It could work for most ring sizes, but works best on a range of about size 4 to 8. (Pictures of the ring base to follow) Ring dimensions: 1.75 inches (W) x 1 inch (H) Item: 670 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.

name: Don't Be Late
description: Don't Be Late "When the Rabbit actually took a watch out of its waistcoat-pocket, and looked at it, and then hurried on, Alice started to her feet, for it flashed across her mind that she had never before seen a rabbit with either a waistcoat-pocket, or a watch to take out of it." Alice's adventures in Wonderland began when she decided to follow the White Rabbit. This ornate brass timepiece commemorates that moment. Other details on this whimsical necklace include a molded rose from the Queen's garden with a champagne ribbon detail, and a key for unlocking secrets. Available in two designs: Notre Dame and Nouveau. Please refer to our picture gallery on the left. Our holiday design, Narcissus, is now available! Kindly click here for a look at Narcissus. Pendant dimensions: Working brass timepiece is approx. 1.2 x 1.2 inches Chain length: 28 inches Very limited stocks available. We cannot guarantee reproductions once sold out. Item: 1420 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.

name: Tux Cameo for Charity
description: The Tux Cameo Charity Project We at Tuxessories are grateful for the warm reception we have received from our customers. This project is our way of forwarding your kind support to those who need it the most. Proceeds from the Tux Cameo sales will be donated to Typhoon Haiyan relief efforts by the Philippine Red Cross. The cameo is comprised of two separate acrylic pieces: a cream colored bust silhouette of a masked hero set on a black scalloped frame. Pendant dimensions: 1.1 x 1.35 inches Chain length: 28 inches Item: 500 Pesos Shipping: 90 Pesos Shipping only applies once per order. Purchase as many items as you'd like and the fee will only apply once.7 inches
